obfuscation: ﻿ Today on TV This essay is supposed to prove my reflections on the uses and abuses of television in society .
original: ﻿ Today on TV  This essay is supposed to show my reflections on the uses and abuses of television in society.

obfuscation: I remember that both television and computers have had quite a similar evolution through history .
original: I think that both television and computers have had quite a similar evolution through history.

obfuscation: When TV foremost came , it was made for the wealthier families that could afford this new technology .
original: When TV first came, it was made for the wealthier families that could afford this new technology.

obfuscation: This was also the case with the computer technology when it did break through .
original: This was also the case with the computer technology when it did break through.

obfuscation: Today these kinds of technologies exist in almost every household and are a part of our daily life .
original: Today these kinds of technologies exist in almost every household and are a part of our daily life.

obfuscation: The problem with TV today is that there are thus many programs and news broadcasts to watch , almost twenty-four hours a day .
original: The problem with TV today is that there are so many programs and news broadcasts to watch, almost twenty-four hours a day.

obfuscation: For some people this is very devastating , because they might have problem getting their work done , for example schoolwork , preparing lessons etc .
original: For some people this is very devastating, because they might have problem getting their work done, for example schoolwork, preparing lessons etc.

obfuscation: It 's thus easy just to sit down in the couch , to relax , flip through the TV-channels and simply get caught in front of the TV , instead of doing the things you should do .
original: It's so easy just to sit down in the couch, to relax, flip through the TV-channels and simply get caught in front of the TV, instead of doing the things you should do.

obfuscation: I know , because I 've been there myself during the high-school years .
original: I know, because I've been there myself during the high-school years.

obfuscation: Because of the fact that the selection of available TV-channels have increased , there is nowadays at least one channel for all kinds of people , music , news , education programs , science programs etc , something for everyone to like .
original: Because of the fact that the selection of available TV-channels have increased, there is now at least one channel for all kinds of people, music, news, education programs, science programs etc, something for everyone to like.

obfuscation: Because of this , TV has a big influence on our lives .
original: Because of this, TV has a big influence on our lives.

obfuscation: Personally I think it 's quite relaxing to study to the sound/music played on both MTV and ZTV .
original: Personally I think it's quite relaxing to study to the sound/music played on both MTV and ZTV.

obfuscation: Because of the fact that these channels play a lot good and more various music than the radio does , my TV is on during the time I 'm at home .
original: Because of the fact that these channels play a lot better and more various music than the radio does, my TV is on during the time I'm at home.

obfuscation: TV is a great communication medium to reach a lot of people , with news , current events , science breakthroughs and a lot of early important information .
original: TV is a great communication medium to reach a lot of people, with news, current events, science breakthroughs and a lot of other important information.

obfuscation: But , unfortunately there are great deals of bad commercials shown too , some of them meant to trick people in buying worthless matters .
original: But, unfortunately there are great deals of bad commercials shown too, some of them meant to trick people in buying worthless things.

obfuscation: And many people do , possibly because it 's so easy .
original: And many people do, maybe because it's so easy.

obfuscation: It 's precisely a phone call away .
original: It's just a phone call away.

obfuscation: Lately , I think that Internet has gained ground against TV in respective areas .
original: Lately, I think that Internet has gained ground against TV in several areas.

obfuscation: You can see videos , moving pictures , read updated news , sports and learn about science in quite a funny direction , purchase food , computers and so on .
original: You can see videos, moving pictures, read updated news, sports and learn about science in quite a funny way, purchase food, computers and so on.

obfuscation: As with TV and computers in their early days , there were only a small part of the population that had access to the Internet a few years ago .
original: As with TV and computers in their early days, there was only a small part of the population that had access to the Internet a few years ago.

obfuscation: Today almost every computer owner has access to the Internet in some way .
original: Today almost every computer owner has access to the Internet in some way.

obfuscation: I remember that Internet will keep growing and affect our lives even more in the future .
original: I think that Internet will keep growing and affect our lives even more in the future.

obfuscation: But however , TV is n't to be forgotten in the future .
original: But still, TV isn't to be forgotten in the future.

obfuscation: I remember that TV programs and commercials influence children today more easily than it did ten or fifteen years ago .
original: I think that TV programs and commercials influence children today more easily than it did ten or fifteen years ago.

obfuscation: This may be because society today is more cruel and tougher .
original: This may be because society today is more cruel and tougher.

obfuscation: Some children programs show a lot of beating and violence in general , and they do it in a funny manner .
original: Some children programs show a lot of beating and violence in general, and they do it in a funny way.

obfuscation: What kinds of impression do these programs give young children ?
original: What kinds of impression do these programs give young children?

obfuscation: They might think that it 's OK to beat up their friends , precisely like the do on TV .
original: They might think that it's OK to beat up their friends, just like the do on TV.

obfuscation: And then they are surprised that he/she starts to cry or get hurt .
original: And then they are surprised that he/she starts to cry or get hurt.

obfuscation: It makes n't seem to hurt on TV .
original: It doesn't seem to hurt on TV.

obfuscation: I think you have to teach your children that it 's only a program , not real life , or make n't let them see these kinds of programs at all until they are ready for it .
original: I think you have to teach your children that it's only a program, not real life, or don't let them see these kinds of programs at all until they are ready for it.

obfuscation: At this point I 'm just guessing , I ca n't speak from my own experiences because I 'm not a parent , so please make n't take it in the wrong way .
original: At this point I'm just guessing, I can't speak from my own experiences because I'm not a parent, so please don't take it in the wrong way.

obfuscation: Today there are a lot of soap/documentary programs , such as Big Brother , Villa Medusa , Mullvaden and many more .
original: Today there are a lot of soap/documentary programs, such as Big Brother, Villa Medusa, Mullvaden and many more.

obfuscation: I do n't know why these programs are so popular ; maybe because todays stressed society make n't allow ordinary people to do these kinds of things .
original: I don't know why these programs are so popular; maybe because todays stressed society don't allow ordinary people to do these kinds of things.

obfuscation: Another potential cause may be that the viewers like to see other people in a worse situation than they are in by themselves .
original: Another possible cause may be that the viewers like to see other people in a worse situation than they are in by themselves.

obfuscation: ( I do n't know , precisely guessing . )
original: (I don't know, just guessing.)

obfuscation: Anyway these programs have a very big audience that continuously follow the competitors `` progress '' on TV .
original: Anyway these programs have a very big audience that continuously follow the competitors "progress" on TV.

obfuscation: As a conclusion I think that TV has affected our lives for as long as we have had access to it , and I think it will continue doing that for quite some time , even though Internet and computers will affect us more and more , whether we like it or not .
original: As a conclusion I think that TV has affected our lives for as long as we have had access to it, and I think it will keep doing that for quite some time, even though Internet and computers will affect us more and more, whether we like it or not.
